name: Bay Area Gators
description: The Bay Area Gators are a startup football organization located in San Francisco. The Bay Area Gators will present an opportunity to youth citywide that includes athletic as well as academic excellence. They have dedicated coaches and volunteers who will lead with discipline, love, passion, and an awesome mentorship that young people need. The Gators focus will be to present a competitive team that will show class and display proper sportsmanship while competing. They will be provided critical l
